Whoops sorry for the confusion.
What I had in mind was the ability to use the Bazel build system to build the custom op. @Russell91, you can follow the model used by some projects in tensorflow/models, look here for example. You setup your custom op as an independent git repository with its own BUILD file, and use TensorFlow as an external project.

body:
Whoops sorry for the confusion.
What I had in mind was the ability to use the Bazel build system to build the custom op. @Russell91, you can follow the model used by some projects in tensorflow/models, look [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/syntaxnet)  for example. You setup your custom op as an independent git repository with its own BUILD file, and use TensorFlow as an external project.
